svg.text: Protecting against the quantum computing revolution

g.text: Quantum computers will break RSA, ECC, and other classical cryptography systems
‚Ä¢ Key sizes ~1-2 KB (vs MB for code-based)
‚Ä¢ Deployed in: TLS, VPNs, secure messaging
‚Ä¢ Protected even if one cryptosystem fails

svg.text: The transition to post-quantum cryptography represents one of the largest security upgrades in computing history
